titleStmt.title: The most excellent history of the valiant and renowned knight, Don Flores of Greece, Knight of the Swans, second sonne to Esplandran, Emperour of Constantinople being a supplement to Amadis de Gaule / written by Mounsieur de Essule, Nicholas de Hereby ... ; translated into English by W.P.
Cronique du tresvaillant et redouté dom Florès de Grèce. English
titleStmt.author: Herberay, Nicolas de, sieur des Essars, 16th cent.
W. P.

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Cronique du tresvaillant et redouté dom Florès de Grèce.
A spurious addition to the Amadis cycle, which the author pretends is a translation from the Spanish. Cf. Thomas, H. Spanish and Portuguese romances of chivalry.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
